content: windflower 6-inch square change hook size and yarn to make square in different sizes materials square shown is crocheted with a j hook and 32 yds of red heart soft yarn™ in the color #4601 off white gauge 4 double_crochet = 1 inch 2 double_crochet row = 1 inch abbreviations beg = beginning skip = skip chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet space = space yo = yarn over special stitches treble cluster = * yo twice insert hook into st yo and pull loop through 2 sts on hook 2 times working in same st repeat from * 2 times you should have 6 loops on hook then yo and pull loop through all sts on hook double_crochet cluster = * yo once insert hook into st yo and pull loop through 2 sts on hook once working in same st repeat from * 2 times you should have 6 loops on hook then yo and pull loop through all sts on hook instructions note square is worked in rounds and is not turned chain 5 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 1 work 12 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch in top of first single_crochet round 2 chain 4 holding the last 2 loops of each one on hook work 2 treble_crochet in same space yo and pull loop through all sts on hook beg treble_crochet cluster made chain 3 treble_crochet cluster in same st see special stitches above * chain 4 skip next 2 sts work treble_crochet cluster chain 3 treble_crochet cluster in next st repeat from * 2 times ending with chain 4 slip_stitch in top of beg treble_crochet cluster 4 two-treble_crochet cluster groups round 3 chain 3 * double_crochet in top of next cluster in next chain-3 space work double_crochet cluster chain 3 double_crochet cluster double_crochet in top of next cluster 4 double_crochet in next chain-4 space repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 4 chain 3 * double_crochet in top of next cluster in next chain-3 space work double_crochet cluster chain 3 double_crochet cluster double_crochet in top of next cluster double_crochet in next 6 sts repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 round 5 chain 3 * double_crochet in top of next cluster in next chain-3 space work double_crochet cluster chain 3 double_crochet cluster double_crochet in top of next cluster double_crochet in next 8 sts repeat from * around ending with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 fasten yarn and weave in ends © 2007 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this
